'''Favonian Goodies''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of Favonian Goodies is obtainable from the [[Of Ballads and Brews/Fecund Blessings|Fecund Blessings]] subevent of [[Of Ballads and Brews]].
